roc_auc.display_name: Area Under the Receiver Operating Characteristic Curve
roc_auc.explanation:
Indicates the performance of a model at classification at all classification levels.
Describes how much the model can distinguish between classes.
Ideal value is 1.0, whereas a score of 0.5 indicates a model has no ability to distinguish between classes.
